GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id:.description: serves an objet from an article based on the provided article ID.

exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an object of an articles comments by the given article_id

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts and serves a new comment associated with the provided article ID

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates and serves vote of given article by article id
